com.gtosoft.libvoyager.android
Class ActivityHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.gtosoft.libvoyager.android.ActivityHelper

public class ActivityHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class will contain useful things that are helpful to users of Activities. This might be for example the ability to perform a BT discovery and connect to the first discovered device. Basic use: 1. Register your "found elm device" callback: aHelper.registerChosenDeviceCallback(chosenCallback); 2. aHelper.startDiscovering(); 3. Expect to get a call to your chosenCallback EventCallback. It will pass you the MAC of the chosen device.

Author:
Brad Hein - GTOSoft LLC
